name: Gridlocked (Update v1.2)
description:
Gridlocked (Update v1.2)

Gridlocked is my first game I have ever created, and was created with GameMaker Studio's Drag and Drop system.

This is pretty much my first game release I have ever done and I've worked pretty hard on this game. It may just be a clone of some other online tron games, but I have things planned to make it different such as new maps to play on, a single player mode that isn't bots (very new developer so I don't know how to do that) and more! I hope you all will enjoy my game and PLEASE give feedback on it. I would love to hear what you guys think! Also everything in this game is made by me, the art and the game. (I'm sorry that I'm not a great artist)

Thank you so much for at least checking me out :)

NOTE!: THIS GAME DOES NOT SUPPORT MAC AND LINUX. THIS IS A WINDOWS ONLY GAME. DO NOT DOWNLOAD UNLESS YOU HAVE A WINDOWS COMPUTER. THAT IS ALL.

UPDATE PLANS

At the moment, I have moved on to bigger and better projects, so Gridlocked is pretty much finished. I am considering making a bug fix patch to optimize the game a loooot more, but we'll see what happens.

Changelog for  Gridlocked v1.2:

-Added 1 new map (Portals)

-Added a map selection screen

-Added a pause menu you can access ingame

-Temporarily removed the blue box for the scoreboard on the grid map, portals doesn't have one. (This may get changed, honestly I don't know.)

-Made WASD work on the menu screens

-Fixed bug which let people pass through the others trails without dying

----------------------------------------------------------------

Thank you and Enjoy my game!

If you would like, Check out 109Dev here. I recently created a newer (and honestly better) game called Micro, and would love if you checked it out!

-Jeffdev
